member.name: T:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator
member.summary: The DynamicCalculator is an action adapter which takes multiple input measurements and performs a calculation on those measurements to generate its own calculated measurement.

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the .

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.PublishFrame(TimeSeriesFramework.IFrame,System.Int32)
member.summary: Publish of time-aligned collection of values that arrived within the concentrator's defined .
member.param: of measurements with the same timestamp that arrived within that are ready for processing.
Index of within a second ranging from zero to - 1.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.ExpressionText
member.summary: Gets or sets the textual representation of the expression.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.VariableList
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of variables used in the expression.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.Imports
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of types which define methods to be imported into the expression parser.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.DynamicCalculator.WaitHandleReleaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the wait handle to be released when the calculation is finished. The default value of null indicates that there will be no wait handle sent and therefore no adapter synchronization.
